query:
ALTER TABLE workflows 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS userId INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS nodes TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '[]',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS edges TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '[]',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS status ENUM('draft', 'active', 'paused') DEFAULT 'draft',
MODIFY COLUMN workspaceId INT NULL,
MODIFY COLUMN triggerType ENUM('time', 'event', 'webhook', 'manual') DEFAULT 'manual',
MODIFY COLUMN triggerConfig JSON NULL;
